articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Italy win Euro 2020 final on penalties to wreck England party - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Roberto Mancini's men recovered from the shock of conceding the quickest goal ever in a European Championship final to equalise and held their nerve to claim a 3-2 shootout victory after a 1-1 draw following extra-time.

articles.title: 'These guys are rock stars': All Blacks in no way surprised by Fiji's first-test effort - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Richie Mo'unga says it's only the New Zealand public who don't watch European footy who would have been taken aback last weekend.
articles.content:
All Blacks first-five Richie Mounga says the only ones surprised by Fijis competitiveness last weekend are the New Zealand public unfamiliar with the rugby scene up north.

articles.author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
articles.title: Euro 2020: 'Football comes to Rome' as Italy break English hearts at Wembley - DW (English)
articles.description: Italy's men's national team has won the European Championships for the first time since 1968 after a penalty shootout victory over England at Wembley. For England, 55 years of hurt go on.
articles.content:
FT: Italy 1-1 England - Italy win Euro 2020 after beating England in a penalty shootout (Bonucci 67' - Shaw 2')Wembley, London
"Football's coming home," they sung but in the end it went to Rome, as … [+29030 chars]
